reasoning: Ectopic rhythm prevalence reported as 60% of adults experience occasional ectopic beats (PACs/PVCs), based on population studies and Holter monitoring data. Reported as prevalence since this is a chronic/recurrent cardiac condition without clear 'new case' incidence.
source: Flensted-Jensen E et al. (2005). Natural history of atrial fibrillation from asymptomatic electrocardiogram to symptomatic arrhythmia: a systematic review.
